version_description:
* Spring is coming. Time for cherry blossoms to bloom!
* Offer history updated to show your lifetime earnings.
* See how your earnings stack up against other Upside users.
* Help us help you. Get 2 friends to use Upside, so we can keep bringing more stations on.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.

* See the status of people you’ve referred to Upside
* Donate your cash back earnings to a local non-profit
* Bug fixes and stability improvements
Experiments to make Upside easier to use, bug fixes, and stability enhancements

* 95 more gas stations available in Virgina Beach, Richmond, and Washington DC
* Easier to read map labels
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

- See how much money you've earned from referring others and which of your referrals is using Upside
- Support local non-profits with your cash back earnings
- Bug fixes: Fb login issues, update gas prices again

* Summer has arrived! Time to enjoy the beach.
* GasForGood: Support renewable energy through Community Power Network
* Bug fix: Referral links now pass referral code correctly.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

- For offers with receipt issues, resubmit receipts in app without contacting support
- Bug fixes

- New users see Upside offers before signing up for an account
- Bug fixes & performance enhancements
- Available in Long Island, NY!

- Get cash back at restaurants, groceries, and gas in DC, MD, VA!
- Upside gas cash back now in Long Island, NY in addition to DC, MD, VA.
- Performance improvements makes the app load much faster now.

* Get cash back at restaurants and groceries.
* App got speedier due to performance improvements we made.
* New app logo. We're now GetUpside!

- Get notified when you earn cash
- Remind your people you invited to use GetUpside
- Small cash outs now have $1 fee applied
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Easier to share app with friends and to see status of your invites
• Updated offers for convenience stores, car washes, and car services
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• See convenience store, car service, and car wash offers on the map
• Upload photos from your photo gallery
• See value of bonuses directly in your offer
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Improved map makes it easier to find the offers you want
• Bug fixes & performance enhancements

• See Google Streetview of the business to help you find the right place to go
• Map of business shows directions to get you there

• Now available in DC, FL, MD, VA & NYC
• Redesign of offer details, instructions on uploading receipts, and improved Google StreetView accuracy
• Overall improvements and bug fixing

What's new:
• Camera detects edges of receipt to ensure you upload the entire receipt
• Review receipt picture to ensure you have all required info

• To help you earn cash back, the app now checks your receipts on the phone to make sure you have all required information before submitting.
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements
* Performance enhancements & bug fixes
* Improved receipt scanning performance & bug fixes

• Improved experience to help you find the right gas station
• App checks to make sure your receipt is within the 4 hour time window for purchase
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements
* Bug fixes and stability improvements

• Clarification that bonuses aren't included in history
• Performance enhancements and bug fixes
• Performance enhancements and bug fixes

- App and offers load faster
- Updates to gift card cash outs
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements
* Cash out bug fixes

* Bigger cash back offers on mid-grade, premium and diesel gas
* Bug fixes and stability improvements

• Security: See your password strength when creating an account
• Performance enhancements & bug fixes
* Fixed an issue that left some users stuck on the splash screen. If you had this issue, please update and try again – sorry about that!

- Improved readability of map labels
- Easier editing of gift card cash out amount
* Faster app loading speed
* Faster app loading speed and bug fixes

• Enhanced restaurant results to help you find the yummiest deals
• Performance improvements & bug fixes

- Fixed app not being able to cash out via gift card
- App stability improvements

* Improved restaurant & grocery receipt upload
* Performance enhancements and bug fixes
* Performance enhancements and bug fixes
* Fixes an issue some users had logging in via Facebook

• Improved cash out process, to make sure you get your money quickly
• Performance enhancements & tweaks
* Performance enhancements & tweaks
* Fixed an issue that left some users stuck on the splash screen. If you had this issue, please update and try again – sorry about that!

We’ve introduced 3000+ more BP gas stations in the app all over the country. Your map is going to be a whole lot greener! Check your email for more details including new stations in your area and new cities (where you can refer people and get those bonuses!).

New Markets! We now have gas station offers in Chicago, Atlanta, Ohio & Western Michigan. And a whole lot more gas partners in many existing markets like Raleigh, Charlotte, Orlando and more. Get cash back and refer friends in these cities to earn even more!

Now there’s an easier-to-use map view, so you can more quickly find sweet offers near you. Earn even more cash back by sharing your referral code. People who refer others to GetUpside earn on average 4 times more than users who don’t. Friends don’t let friends pay full price for gas.

We’ve launched 1,000+ new gas stations across the Midwest! Detroit, Indianapolis, St. Louis, and Kansas City... just to name a few. Celebrate! And then put this news to work. Refer friends for a big bonus the first time they use the app, and a smaller bonus for each fill-up after that.
Hungry? We've got you covered with hundreds of new restaurants on the app in Houston, Chicago & Washington, DC. Treat yourself with up to 35% cash back at Burger King, Papa John's and more!
* Don’t miss out on all the features offered in-app! Click the hamburger at the top left to track your earnings, manage referrals, and browse all the cash-out options.

In the app, we make it easy to manage your direct and indirect referrals. That means you know exactly who is and is not using your referral code. So feel free to remind your mom that she needs to use the app so you can keep earning that $$$.

Not all change is visible, but we can still celebrate it. Our fixes include resolving an issue that prevented some users from uploading receipts. Plus, we have new gift card options for you when you cash out. Enjoy!
* This update includes our new look, as well as bug fixes to make your GetUpside experience even better.
* In this release, we fixed some bugs to make your experience even more seamless. Happy shopping! Oh, and don't forget to refer friends so you both win.

You just keep on earning cash back; we’ll keep working to make your experience even better.
This release includes bug fixes and performance enhancements to make the app even easier to use.

Getting cash back just got easier! Now you can manage the cards you have saved for Check In and directly add new ones. Plus, if you need help, we've added a handy support chat feature. Enjoying GetUpside? Remember to tell your friends and family to get those referral bonuses.
25 gift cards now available to cash out in addition to PayPal and paper check. Earn money now to cash out for holiday gifts! This release also includes performance enhancements.
You just keep on earning cash back; we’ll keep working to make your experience even better. In this release, we’ve made signing up even easier, and squashed some bugs.
Bug fixes and stability improvements
Thanks for using GetUpside! This release features improvements to the history view, as well as bug fixes to help you earn.
Thanks for using GetUpside! This release features improvements to the history view, as well as bug fixes to help you earn.
Thanks for using GetUpside! This release features improvements to the check-in feature, as well as bug fixes to help you earn cash back.
Thanks for using GetUpside! This release features improvements to the check-in feature, as well as bug fixes to help you earn cash back.
1000 new gas stations in the last week alone! GetUpside now works at even more places than ever. Plus, you can now sign in with Apple. Thanks for using GetUpside!
Introducing even higher offers to help with essential travel. Share GetUpside with frontline workers – they’ll save more by using your referral code.
More places to earn cash back, new features to help protect your earnings, and bug fixes to make saving money even easier. Thanks for using GetUpside!
We update the app regularly so that we can make it better and easier for you to get cash back. Thanks for using GetUpside!
Now earn up to $20 cash back on groceries in Raleigh, NC and up to 25¢/gal at an additional 1,000 new gas stations.
Hello, Hollywood! GetUpside offers are now available all over Los Angeles. Refer any friends in LA for bonus cash. Plus some bug fixes to improve your experience.
More clickable links, more cash back, more money on your referrals. Need we say more? You should really update.

More clickable links, more cash back, more money on your referrals. Need we say more? You should really update.
Fixes critical issue.
We want you to earn more money! This release contains tips and guides for earning money on groceries and colorful content that gives you a heads up about new ways to earn money near you.
Only want to cash out some of your earnings? Now you can cash out what you want via PayPal or gift card. We’ve also enhanced the referral program to make bigger payouts for you and your friends.
You’ve got mail! Now you can access messages in your new GetUpside mailbox. Click on the left nav & “inbox” to see personalized bonus offers and learn about new features.
In this release, we fixed some bugs to make your experience even more seamless. Happy shopping! Oh, and don’t forget to refer friends so you both win.

New in Los Angeles and Georgia: cash back on groceries just in time for Thanksgiving! That’s in addition to groceries in Raleigh, NC & hundreds of restaurants in Chicago, Minneapolis, Houston and DC. We’re working to get you more cash back on food!
We're celebrating 250 Nashville stations with gas offers - many also offering up to 20% cash back in their convenience stores. Plus bug fixes and enhancements.
Snacking on the go? Now more users can get cash back on coffee, soda, snacks and more at convenience stores. Look for the basket icon in the app to see where!

Snacking on the go? Now more users can get cash back on coffee, soda, snacks and more at convenience stores. Look for the basket icon in the app to see where! Also comes with new improvements and bug fixes.
Introducing 250+ gas stations in the San Francisco Bay Area plus more info & better directions to gas stations to help more people earn cash back.
Introducing 250+ gas stations in the San Francisco Bay Area plus more info & better directions to gas stations to help more people earn cash back. Also includes important bug fixes.

Not all change is visible, but we can still celebrate it! Now the app makes it even easier to Check In for cash back at your favorite gas stations, restaurants, and grocery stores… all while being COVID safe, of course.

New look, same easy cash back. Now you'll see blue buttons instead of orange when you claim a GetUpside offer near you. And keep an eye out! You'll see more changes coming your way in the next few months.
Easy cash back, easier! There are a bunch new ways we're simplifying your experience in the app, like progress bars to help you Check In. Open up, take a look, and turn those errands into earnings.
This new version enables surprise bonuses and treats for you. We could all use a little boost every now and then. Update & keep an eye out for new perks.
See a great offer and know a friend nearby? Now you can share restaurant and grocery offers directly! Your friends will thank you.

Your history tab just got a makeover! Now you can see your lifetime earnings, pending cash back, and completed transactions all in one place. Plus, an easy new way to show-off how much cash back you’ve earned when you refer new friends!
Show me the money!! Now you can transfer cash back from your GetUpside account straight to your bank.
In this release, we fixed some bugs to make your experience even more seamless. Happy shopping! Oh, and don't forget to refer friends so you both win.
You just keep on earning cash back; we’ll keep working to make your experience even better.
In this release, we fixed some bugs. You just keep on earning cash back; we'll keep working to make your experience even better.
In this release, we fixed some bugs. You just keep on earning cash back; we'll keep working to make your experience even better.
